00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNREUSE  0x00000001     /* Reuse pod with identical properties */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 
00053 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00062 
00063 /* Flags for context checking */
00064 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00067 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00068 
00069 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00070 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00071 
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00161 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \

00165     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))

00177     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00285 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00286 {
00287     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00288     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00289 }
00290 
00291 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00292 {
00293     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00294         pod->minpri + incr :
00295         pod->minpri - incr;
00296 }
00297 
00298 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00299 {
00300     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00301         pod->maxpri - incr :
00302         pod->maxpri + incr;
00303 }
00304 
00305 static inline int xnpod_compare_prio (int inprio, int outprio)
00306 {
00307     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00308        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00309     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00310     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00311 }
00312 
00313 static inline int xnpod_rescale_prio (int prio)
00314 {
00315     return xnpod_get_qdir(nkpod) == xnqueue_up ?
00316         nkpod->minpri - prio :
00317         nkpod->maxpri - prio - 1;
00318 }
00319 
00320 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00321 {
00322     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00323     spl_t s;
00324 
00325     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00326     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00327     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00328     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00329     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00330 }
00331 
00332     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00333 
00334 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00335     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00336 
00337 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00338     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00339 
00340 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00341     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00342 
00343 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00344     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00345 
00346 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00347     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00348 
00349 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00350     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00351 
00352 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00353     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00354 
00355 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00356     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00357 
00358 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00359     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00360 
00361 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00362     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00363 
00364 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00365     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00366 
00367 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00368     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00369 
00370 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00371     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00372 
00373 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00374     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00375 
00376 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00377     (xnpod_root_p())
00378 
00379 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00380 
00381 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00382     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00384 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void)
00385 {
00386     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00387 }
00388 
00389 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void)
00390 {
00391     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00392     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00393 }
00394 
00395 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks)
00396 {
00397     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00398 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00399     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00400 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00401     return ticks;
00402 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00403 }
00404 
00405 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t)
00406 {
00407 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00408     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00409 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00410     return t;
00411 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00412 }

00470 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00471 {
00472     spl_t s;
00473 
00474     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00475 
00476     if (nkpod->schedlck++ == 0)
00477         __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00478 
00479     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00480 }
00481 
00482 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00483 {
00484     spl_t s;
00485 
00486     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00487 
00488     if (--nkpod->schedlck == 0)
00489         {
00490         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00491         xnpod_schedule();
00492         }
00493 
00494     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00495 }

00526 static inline void xnpod_yield (void)
00527 {
00528     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);

00537 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void)

00547 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS
00548 static inline void xnpod_acc_exec_time(xnsched_t *sched, xnthread_t *thread)
00549 {
00550     xnticks_t now = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00551 
00552     thread->stat.exec_time += now - sched->last_csw;
00553     sched->last_csw = now;
00554 }
00555 
00556 static inline void xnpod_reset_exec_stats(xnthread_t *thread)
00557 {
00558     thread->stat.exec_time = 0;
00559     thread->stat.exec_start = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00560 }
00561 
00562 static inline void xnpod_update_csw_date(xnsched_t *sched)
00563 {
00564     sched->last_csw = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc();
00565 }
